val.html:
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  font-family: monospace;
}

tokenizedLines.html: * {
margin: 0;
padding: 0;
box-sizing: border-box;
font-family: monospace;
}

val.html:
body {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

tokenizedLines.html: body {
display: flex;
flex-direction: column;
min-height: 100vh;
}

val.html:
.content {
  flex: 1;
}

tokenizedLines.html: .content {
flex: 1;
}

val.html:
.content {
  flex: 1;
  /* CENTER EVERYTHING VERTICALLY */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
}

flex: 1;
/* CENTER EVERYTHING VERTICALLY */
